DOC.brief_summary: This research do see change visual reading function correlate change optical retinal image quality . We hypothesize change deterioration tear film quality dynamic may negative effect read function . People without dry eye syndrome may enroll .
DOC.criteria: General inclusion criterion subject include : Ages 50 89 year Capacity give informed consent . Selfreported literacy ( i.e . `` Yes '' answer question `` Have learn read ? '' ) Additional inclusion criterion dry eye group include : A previous diagnosis dry eye syndrome eyecare specialist Ocular Surface Disease Index total score 13 Additional inclusion criterion Sjögren 's syndrome group include : A previous diagnosis Sjögren 's syndrome immunology specialist , per ACR criterion 22 Additional inclusion criterion normal control subject include : No previous history dry eye diagnosis Ocular Surface Disease Index total score 12 Total corneal conjunctival stain score 0 Exclusion criterion include : A binocular vision 20/25 ( habitual correction ) Any ocular surgery within last 3 month . Mental issue , illiteracy , language problem might possibly interfere read ability History take current use topical prescription antiinflammatory eyedrop ( include , cyclosporine steroid well glaucoma eyedrop ) . Subjects willing discontinue treatment least period 30 day place `` wash period '' per discretion investigator subject safety , eligible end period , give criterion meet . Otherwise , subject medication exclude .
